title: The Other Border: The FBI in Canada
description:
The head of FBI operations in Canada discusses the Bureau's partnerships and presence in our neighbor to the north - one of the busiest FBI offices abroad.

Follow Frank on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1
